trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som håndterer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand"> </xref> hendelse for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: When you create a ListCommandEventHandler delegate for a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter ListCommandEventHandler representant for en <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>kontrollen, kan du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> notifies the handler when an item event is generated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>varsler behandlingsprogrammet når en hendelse for elementet genereres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du fjerner representanten, kalles hendelsesbehandlingen når hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: For default rendering, the control provides a UI that allows the user to click individual list items.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen gir et grensesnitt som lar brukeren klikker individuelle listeelementer til standard gjengivelse.

trans-unit.source: On postback, the control calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnItemCommand%2A> event handler, with an argument pointing to the source item.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen på tilbakesending, kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnItemCommand%2A>hendelsesbehandling, til et argument som peker til kildeelementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnItemCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A> property is `null`.
When rendering with a template, the event bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnItemCommand%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når gjengis med en mal, hendelsen bubbling mekanisme av ASP.NET kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnItemCommand%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnItemCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event handler is passed a parameter, pointing to the source item, and to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A> property of the control that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen er sendt en parameter, peker til kildeelementet og til den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>-egenskapen for kontrollen som genererte hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to render a single list item with multiple associated interactions.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du ikke gjengi et enkelt listeelement med flere tilknyttede bruk.

trans-unit.source: To render an item as a hyperlink, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemsAsLinks%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil deaktivere et element som en hyperkobling, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemsAsLinks%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemsAsLinks%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> property is used for display, and the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value%2A> property are used as the target link address when selected.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A>egenskapen brukes for visning og innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value%2A>egenskapen, brukes som mål koblingsadressen når valgt.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Command events will not be generated for these links.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kommandoen hendelser blir ikke genereres for disse koblingene.
